sense.def: Illness Sign of stiff limbs with difficulties to move. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 19: 治中風不能語，四 肢 強，宜服天麻散方 , “To cure wind stroke with an inability to speak, and when the four limbs are stiff , the recipe to ingest the powder with tian ma is advisable”. Zhi jing 止驚 , to stop fright [10]

Alternative Names ding jing 定驚 , to stabilize fright; chu jing 除 驚 , to eliminate fright; pi jing 辟驚 , to break up fright; jie jing 截驚 , to cut fright. Therapeutic Approach including various means to cure fright wind and fright palpitation. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 5: 牛黃，益肝膽除熱，定精神止驚 , “ Niu huang adds [qi] to the liver and gallbladder and eliminates heat. It stabilizes the essence spirit and stops fright ”.
